message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for a mutually beneficial deal.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was hoping to get a better deal. Considering the product's value to you is $1,200,000, I'm willing to offer $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering our negotiations so far.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is generous, the product's value to me remains higher.  I'm willing to come down to $1,500,000. I believe this price reflects the true worth of what's being offered.

I understand your position, but I'm still trying to find a mutually beneficial deal. Considering your initial offer was $1,600,000 and your new offer is $1,500,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer $1,350,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.

Bob, you're clearly recognizing the value of this product, and I respect your approach.  Let's find a number we can both agree on. To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the potential benefits you'll gain.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still trying to find a better deal. Considering your initial offer was $1,600,000 and your new offer is $1,450,000, I'll offer $1,320,000. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.

Bob, I appreciate our back and forth here, but the gap between our positions seems persistent. I'm confident this product is worth every bit of $1,400,000, and frankly, that's the closest I'm able to go. If we can't find agreement at that number, I may need to explore other options for selling.

I understand your position, but I'm still trying to find a mutually beneficial deal. Considering your initial offer was $1,600,000 and your new offer is $1,400,000, I'll offer $1,380,000. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
